Allows Mini-Games that have multiple levels to have a Check on EVERY level.
Recommended for people who REALLY like playing the Mini-Games.
This Manual doesn't have enough Checks to fit all of the Progression items without some extra.
(Well, unless you enabled Minigamesanity, but how many people are actually going to do that?)
As such, you get the choice. Choose which set of extra Checks you'd wish to add.
Extended Race Checks - Top 3 and/or 1st in each RACE is a Check.
Extended Character Checks - Top 3 and/or 1st with each CHARACTER is a Check.
Both Extended - Both of the above sets of Checks are applied.
